content: प्रभू {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To arise, proceed, spring up, to be born or produced, originate (with <ab>abl.</ab>); लोभात् क्रोधः प्रभवति <ls>H. 1. 27</ls>; स्वायंभुवान्मरीचेर्यः प्रबभूव प्रजापतिः <ls>Ś. 7. 9</ls>; पुरुषः प्रबभूवाग्नेर्विस्मयेन सहर्त्विजां <ls>R. 10. 50</ls>; <ls>Bg. 8. 18.</ls> {@--2@} To appear, become visible; <ls>H. 4. 84.</ls> {@--3@} To multiply, increase; see प्रभूत. {@--4@} To be strong or powerful, prevail, predominate, show one's power; प्रभवति हि महिम्ना स्वेन योगीश्वरीयं <ls>Māl. 9. 52</ls>; प्रभवति भगबान् विधिः <ls>K.</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1. 44.</ls> {@--5@} To be able or equal, have power for (with <ab>inf.</ab>); कुसुमान्यपि गात्रसंगमात्प्रभवंत्यायुरपोहितुं यदि <ls>R. 8. 44</ls>; कोन्यो हुतवहाद्दग्धुं प्रभविष्यति <ls>Ś. 4</ls>; <ls>Ś. 6. 30</ls>; <ls>V. 1. 9</ls>; <ls>U. 2. 4</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1.</ls> {@--6@} To have control or power over, prevail over, be master of (usually with <ab>gen.</ab>, sometimes with <ab>dat.</ab> or <ab>loc.</ab>); यदि प्रभविष्याम्यात्मनः <ls>Ś. 1</ls>; प्रभवति निजस्य कन्यकाजनस्य महाराजः <ls>Māl. 4</ls>; तत्प्रभवति अनुशासने देवी <ls>Ve. 2</ls>; विधिरपि न येभ्यः प्रभवति <ls>Bh. 2. 94.</ls> {@--7@} To be a match for (with <ab>dat.</ab>); प्रभवति मल्लो मल्लाय <ls>Mbh.</ls> {@--8@} To be sufficient for, be able to contain; <ls>Ku. 6. 59.</ls> {@--9@} To be contained in (wit <ab>loc.</ab>); गुरुः प्रहर्षः प्रबभूव नात्मनि <ls>R. 3. 17.</ls> {@--10@} To be useful. {@--11@} To implore, beseech. {@--12@} To extend beyond, surpass (<ab>Ved.</ab>) {@--13@} To profit, avail. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To increase, augment. {@--2@} To provide more fully. {@--3@} To recognize. {@--4@} To gain power or strength. {@--5@} To make powerful.
